spec_data.Name: perl-LV
spec_data.Description:
This module makes lvalue subroutines easy and practical to use. It's
inspired by the lvalue module which is sadly problematic because of the
existence of another module on CPAN called Lvalue.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:45:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module to make lvalue subroutines easy and practical
